casebody.data:
No. 15. Salvá v. Estate of Borrá Ginart. Motion for the admission of an appeal from a decision of the Supreme Court of Porto Eico to the Supreme Court of the United States. Decided April 18, 1905. Messrs. López Landrón and Pettingill, for petitioners; Messrs. José Guzmán Benitez and Hartzell and Rodriguez Serra, for opponents.

The admission of the appeal was denied.
